users.discription: The Space Shuttle Explorer, commanded by veteran astronaut Matt Kowalski, is in Earth orbit to service the Hubble Space Telescope (HST). Dr. Ryan Stone is aboard on her first space mission, to perform hardware upgrades on the Hubble.

Linguist Louise Banks leads a team of investigators when gigantic spaceships touch down around the world. As nations teeter on the verge of global war, Banks and her crew must find a way to communicate with the extraterrestrial visitors.
users.story: Linguist Louise Banks's daughter Hannah dies at the age of twelve from an incurable illness.
users.producer: Shawn Levy, Dan Levine, Aaron Ryder, David Linde
users.starCast: Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker
users.production: Film Nation Entertainment, Lava Bear Films, 21 Laps Entertainment

users.discription: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.
users.story: Django, an African slave, is freed by a German bounty hunter and becomes his apprentice. Together, they attempt to rescue his wife, who has been enslaved by a charming but cruel plantation owner.
users.producer: Stacey Sher, Reginald Hudlin, Pilar Savone
users.starCast: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio
users.distributer: The Weinstein Company (United States), Columbia Pictures (through Sony Pictures Releasing International; International)

users.discription: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom is a 2018 science fiction action adventure film, directed by J. A. Bayona, written by Colin Trevorrow and Derek Connolly, along with executive producer Steven Spielberg.
users.story: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom is a 2018 science fiction action film directed by J. A. Bayona and written by Derek Connolly and Colin Trevorrow.
users.producer: Frank Marshall, Patrick Crowley, Belén Atienza
users.starCast: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Rafe Spall, Toby Jones, Ted Levine, BD Wong, Jeff Goldblum
users.production: Universal Pictures, Amblin Entertainment, Legendary Pictures, The Kennedy/Marshall Company, Perfect World Pictures

users.discription: The fourth installment in the Avengers saga is the culmination of 22 interconnected Marvel films and the climax of a journey. The world's heroes finally understand just how fragile reality is, and the sacrifices that must be made to uphold it, in a story of friendship, teamwork and setting aside differences to overcome an impossible obstacle.
users.story: After Thanos, an intergalactic warlord, disintegrates half of the universe, the Avengers must reunite and assemble again to reinvigorate their trounced allies and restore balance.
users.starCast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner. Don Cheadle, Paul Rudd, Brie Larson, Karen Gillan, Danai Gurira, Benedict Wong, Jon Favreau, Bradley Cooper, Gwyneth Paltrow, Josh Brolin

users.discription: Joker is a 2019 American psychological thriller film directed by Todd Phillips from a screenplay he co-wrote with Scott Silver. Based on DC Comics characters, it stars Joaquin Phoenix and provides an alternative origin story for the Joker.
users.story: Arthur Fleck, a party clown, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of crime and chaos.
users.producer: Todd Phillips, Bradley Cooper, Emma Tillinger Koskoff
users.starCast: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
users.production: Warner Bros. Pictures, DC Films, Village Roadshow Pictures, Bron Creative, Joint Effort

users.discription: The Matrix is a 1999 science fiction action film written and directed by the Wachowskis.[a] It is the first installment in the Matrix film series, starring Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving, and Joe Pantoliano.
users.story: Neo, a computer programmer and hacker, has always questioned the reality of the world around him. His suspicions are confirmed when Morpheus, a rebel leader, contacts him and reveals the truth to him.
users.production: Warner Bros. Pictures, Village Roadshow Pictures, Groucho II Film, Partnership Silver Pictures
users.release: March 24, 1999 (Mann Village Theater) March 31, 1999 (United States) April 8, 1999 (Australia)

users.discription: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.
users.story: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.
users.producer: Emma Thomas, Christopher Nolan, Lynda Obst
users.starCast: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
users.production: Paramount Pictures, Warner Bros. Pictures, Legendary Pictures, Syncopy Inc.
users.distributer: Paramount Pictures (United States and Canada) Warner Bros. Pictures (International)
users.release: October 26, 2014 (TCL Chinese Theatre) November 5, 2014 (United States) November 7, 2014 (United Kingdom)

users.discription: Sam Bahadur (stylised as SAMबहादुर ; lit. transl. Sam the Brave) is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language biographical war drama film based on the life of India's first field marshal, Sam Manekshaw.
users.writter: Bhavani Iyer, Shantanu Shrivastava, Meghna Gulzar
users.story: Sam Manekshaw is one of the most decorated officers in the Indian army, serving for over four decades and fighting in five wars. He is the first army officer to be promoted to the rank of Field Marshal.
users.starCast: Vicky Kaushal, Fatima Sana, Shaikh Sanya Malhotra

users.discription: A heart-wrenching tale that captures the pain, suffering, and struggle of the Kashmiri Pandit community in 1990 and leads Krishna, a young college student, to set out on a quest to uncover the truth.
users.story: Krishna endeavours to uncover the reason behind his parents' brutal killings in Kashmir. He is shocked to uncover a web of lies and conspiracies in connection with the massive genocide.
users.producer: Tej Narayan Agarwal, Abhishek Agarwal, Pallavi Joshi, Vivek Agnihotri[
users.starCast: Mithun Chakraborty, Anupam Kher, Darshan Kumaar
users.production: Zee Studios, Abhishek Agarwal Arts, I am Buddha Production

users.discription: 1975. A chronicle of the incidents that took place under the leadership of Mrs. Indira Gandhi, one of the most powerful women in Indian history.
users.writter: Tanvi Kesari, Pasumarthy, Kangana Ranaut, Ritesh Shah
users.story: The incidents that take place under the leadership of Mrs. Indira Gandhi, one of the most powerful women in Indian history.
users.producer: Kangana Ranaut, Zee Studios, Renu Pitti
users.starCast: Kangana Ranaut, Vishak Nair, Anupam Kher, Shreyas Talpade, Mahima Chaudhry, Milind Soman, Satish Kaushik, Darshan Pandya

accordion.question: What is Netflix?
accordion.answer: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries and more – on thousands of internet-connected devices. You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single ad – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover, and new TV shows and movies are added every week!

accordion.question: How much does Netflix cost?
accordion.answer: Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from ₹149 to ₹649 a month. No extra costs, no contracts.

accordion.question: Where I can watch?
accordion.answer: Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your Netflix account to watch instantly on the web at netflix.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the Netflix app, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles.You can also download your favourite shows with the iOS or Android app. Use downloads to watch while you're on the go and without an internet connection. Take Netflix with you anywhere.

accordion.question: How do I cancel?
accordion.answer: Netflix is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account anytime.

accordion.question: What can I watch on Netflix?
accordion.answer: Netflix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Netflix originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.

accordion.question: Is Netflix good for kids?
accordion.answer: The Netflix Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and films in their own space. Kids profiles come with PIN-protected parental controls that let you restrict the maturity rating of content kids can watch and block specific titles you don’t want kids to see.
